page.title: 16MINSTHORPE FESTIVAL
page.content: I went to Minsthorpe Festival on Sunday I marched in a parade from South Kirby to Minsthorpe. There was another parade from Upton, the cubs walked with that one.I saw the mayor and mayoress.There was a cub stall, a brownie stall and a book stall.There was a play area with a bouncey, and a fire engine that children could go on. There was a Punch and Judy show and a spin the wheel game. There was a big skip with a clowns face painted round it and people had to kick a ball through his eyes or mouth. There were some electronic aeroplanes and helicopters and they had a fight.
